Title: What's New, Blue?
Plot: What's new? Blue and the Blue's Clues characters are trying out new things and so Blue and Steve decide to create ""Blue's News"" to document it. See Blue rollerskate, Pail try playing basketball, big news about Paprika, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper and more. That's the news - now everyone knows.
GuestStars: Sierra Leitner, Jazmyn Boone, Brian Agular, Marcus Beckett, Matthew Cherry, Christina Correia, Douglas G. Davis, Lauren Lawson, Khalia Rabain, Anthony Rossitto
